title: Sen. Mikulski To Spend Rest Of Her Term 'Sizzling With Advocacy'
teaser: Democratic Sen. Barbara Mikulski of Maryland recently announced she will not seek re-election in 2016. Renee Montagne talks to Mikulski about her long career and why she's retiring now.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
